name: Priestley CGD Wrriors
description:
2018 Final Major Project by Bart, this is a two player fighter with a very unique style and feel. 

This was part of the final major project of the year 2 Level 3 Btec Game Design at Priestley College Warrington. All aspects of the game is designed and created by the student as part of their course work.

Controllers are needed to play the game
